column4: after creating the usb startdisk from the system menu in 8.10, where would i find the xorg.conf that it uses? I need to make it work with dual screens.
There isn't any. When your USB system boots, it generates for itself an xorg.conf that it thinks will work well for the computer it's being booted on.
so i just need to boot it up and change it then?
Most likely, yeah. You could boot it up and use the GUI tool to do dual screen if you'd like. Or you could enable persistence and set it up just once.
